TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LiteralMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 控件中的内容如何呈现。

span.span: Specifies how the content in a control is rendered.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 枚举表示你可以如何为指定的模式中的内容时呈现控件。The enumeration represents the modes that you can specify for how the content in a control is rendered. 属性使用这些枚举值来设置的内容的行为中的属性控件。The property uses these enumeration values to set the behavior of the contents of the property in a control. 如果指定`PassThrough`的全部内容属性传递到设备或浏览器不做任何修改。If you specify `PassThrough`, the entire contents of the property are passed to the device or browser without any modifications. 例如，如果属性控件包含`
`标记，它发送到所有设备和浏览器而不考虑是否支持。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, it is sent to all devices and browsers regardless of whether it is supported. 如果指定`Encode`，有关内容属性转换为 HTML 编码的字符串在呈现之前。If you specify `Encode`, the contents for the property are converted into an HTML-encoded string before rendering. 例如，如果属性控件包含`
`标记，它将被转换为`<hr>`并发送到设备或浏览器。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, it will be converted to `<hr>` and sent to the device or browser. 如果指定`Transform`的呈现行为属性取决于要呈现的标记类型。If you specify `Transform`, the rendering behavior of the property depends on the type of markup being rendered. 当控件呈现为设备或浏览器支持 HTML 或 XHTML，指定转换生成指定传递相同的行为。When the control is rendered for a device or browser that supports HTML or XHTML, specifying Transform produces the same behavior as specifying PassThrough. 所有标记标记和元素属性呈现到请求浏览器。All markup tags and elements for the property are rendered for the requesting browser. 当控件呈现为 HTML 或 XHTML，如 WML 或 cHTML 以外的标记语言，则可以使用的转换值以删除不受支持的标记元素。When the control is rendered for a markup language other than HTML or XHTML, such as WML or cHTML, you can use the Transform value to remove unsupported markup elements. 在此情况下，任何标记语言元素中目标的标记语言不支持的属性不会呈现控件。In this case, any markup-language elements of the property that are not supported in the targeted markup language are not rendered for the control. 例如，如果属性控件包含`
`标记，标记将被删除之前将内容发送到 WML 设备。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, the tag is removed before the content is sent to a WML device. 如果不受支持的标记包含的内容，仅标记将被删除，并将内容发送到设备或浏览器。If an unsupported tag contains content, only the tag is removed and the content is sent to the device or browser. 例如，如果属性包含的内容`Test`、``和``而将文本中删除标记`Test`发送到设备或浏览器。For example, if the property contains the content `Test`, the `` and `` tags are removed while the text `Test` is sent to the device or browser. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set a control's property. 属性最初设置为`Encode`中控件的声明性语法。The property is initially set to `Encode` in the declarative syntax for the control. 在页面加载后，用户可以单击一个按钮以设置属性`PassThrough`。After the page loads, the user can click a button to set the property to `PassThrough`. 这将导致的内容属性以不同的方式呈现。This causes the contents of the property to render differently. [!code-aspx-vb[Literal.Mode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Literal.Mode/VB/literal.modevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralMode Encode = int32(2)

summary.span: 对文本控件的内容进行 HTML 编码。

span.span: The literal control's contents are HTML-encoded.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralMode PassThrough = int32(1)

summary.span: 不修改文本控件的内容。

span.span: The literal control's contents are not modified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralMode Transform = int32(0)

summary.span: 移除文本控件中不受支持的标记语言元素。

span.span: The literal control's unsupported markup-language elements are removed.

summary.span: 如果文本控件在支持 HTML 或 XHTML 的浏览器上呈现，则不修改控件的内容。

span.span: If the literal control is rendered on a browser that supports HTML or XHTML, the control's contents are not modified.
